TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed JumpList extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public NotInheritable Class JumpList Implements ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 表示作为菜单显示在 Windows 7 任务栏按钮上的项和任务的列表。

span.span: Represents a list of items and tasks displayed as a menu on a Windows 7 taskbar button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]任务栏提供了用于直接从任务栏按钮启动程序，通过使用跳转列表的增强的功能。The [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar provides enhanced functionality for starting programs directly from the taskbar button by using Jump Lists. 跳转列表中还使用[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]开始菜单。Jump Lists are also used in the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] Start menu. 通过右键单击任务栏按钮或单击开始菜单中的某个程序旁边的箭头访问跳转列表。You access a Jump List by right-clicking a taskbar button or by clicking the arrow next to a program in the Start menu. 跳转列表的详细信息，请参阅[任务栏](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178478)部分中的 Windows 用户体验交互准则。For more information about Jump Lists, see the [Taskbar](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178478) section of the Windows User Experience Interaction Guidelines. 类中的跳转列表功能提供托管的包装[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]任务栏并管理数据传递给[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]shell。The class provides a managed wrapper for the Jump List functionality in the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar and manages the data passed to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell. 提供的功能类不是版本中可用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]早于[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]。The functionality exposed by the class is not available in versions of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] earlier than [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]. 使用的应用程序类的其他版本中将运行[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]，但不是能跳转列表。Applications that use the class will run in other versions of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)], but the Jump List will not be available. 有关 Windows shell 和本机跳转列表 Api 的详细信息，请参阅[任务栏扩展](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178479)。For more information about the Windows shell and native Jump List APIs, see [Taskbar Extensions](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178479). 下图显示了跳转列表的 Windows Media Player，与中的项**任务**并**频繁**类别。The following illustration shows the Jump List for Windows Media Player, with items in the **Tasks** and **Frequent** categories. ![Windows Media Player 跳跃](~/add/media/wpfshell-jumplist.png "Windows Media Player 跳转列表")![Windows Media Player Jump List](~/add/media/wpfshell-jumplist.png "Windows Media Player Jump List") Windows Media Player 跳跃菜单Windows Media Player Jump List ## 配置跳转列表Configuring a Jump List 跳转列表可以包含两种类型的项，和一个。Jump Lists can contain two types of items, a and a . 一个是一个链接到程序和一个是指向文件的链接。A is a link to a program and a is a link to a file. 通过创建来直观地分隔跳转列表中的项不具有和指定。You can visually separate items in a Jump List by creating a that does not have a and specified. 此空将显示为一条水平线跳转列表中。This empty will be displayed as a horizontal line in the Jump List. > [!NOTE] > 如果在指定的文件类型未注册应用程序后，该文件不会出现在跳转列表。If the type of the file specified in a is not registered with your application, the file will not appear in the Jump List. 例如，如果您添加指向.txt 文件，必须注册您的应用程序来处理.txt 文件。For example, if you add a that points to a .txt file, your application must be registered to handle .txt files. 有关详细信息，请参阅[简介文件关联](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178480)。For more information, see [Introduction to File Associations](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178480). 跳转项放入中的类别。Jump items are placed into categories in the . 默认情况下， 显示在“任务”类别中。By default, a is displayed in the **Tasks** category. 或者，可以指定为。Alternatively, you can specify a for the . 可以指定是否在标准**最近**和**频繁**中的显示类别通过设置和属性。You can specify whether the standard **Recent** and **Frequent** categories are displayed in the by setting the and properties. 这些类别中的内容管理的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]shell。The contents of these categories are managed by the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell. 因为这些类别中可能包含许多相同的数据，通常显示的一个或另一端是你，但不可同时使用两者。Because these categories might contain much of the same data, you typically display one or the other in your , but not both. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] 如果通过公共文件对话框打开或用来打开通过文件类型关联的应用程序将自动管理最近使用的项目。automatically manages recent items if they are opened through a common file dialog box or used to open an application through file type association. 通过跳转列表访问某一项，可以通知[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]外壳程序以将项添加到**最近**通过调用类别方法。When an item is accessed through the Jump List, you can notify the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell to add the item to the **Recent** category by calling the method. ## 将跳转列表应用到 Windows ShellApplying a Jump List to the Windows Shell 不能直接访问 shell 的跳转列表或其内容读入类。You cannot access the shell's Jump List directly or read its contents into the class. 相反，类提供的表示形式跳转列表，可以使用，并将应用到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]shell。Instead, the class provides a representation of a Jump List that you can work with, and then apply to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell. 通常创建并将其设置一次当首次运行该应用程序。You typically create a and set it one time when the application is first run. 但是，您可以修改或替换在运行时。However, you can modify or replace the at run time. 如果已设置属性，你必须应用到 Windows shell 之前其内容将出现在任务栏跳转列表中。When you have set the properties, you must apply the to the Windows shell before its contents appear in the taskbar Jump List. 这自动完成时首次附加到应用程序，在 XAML 中或在调用方法。This is done automatically when the is first attached to an application, either in XAML or in a call to the method. 如果您修改的内容在运行时，必须调用方法以将其当前的内容应用到 Windows shell。If you modify the contents of the at run time, you must call the method to apply its current contents to the Windows shell. ## 在 XAML 中设置跳转列表Setting a Jump List in XAML 一个不会自动附加到对象。A is not automatically attached to an object. 附加到对象在 XAML 中的使用附加的属性语法。You attach a to an object in XAML by using the attached property syntax. 类实现接口以支持 XAML 声明。The class implements the interface to support XAML declaration of a . 如果是在 XAML 中声明，附加到当前，它将自动应用于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]shell 时初始化。If the is declared in XAML and attached to the current , it is automatically applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell when the is initialized. ## 设置和修改代码中的跳转列表Setting and Modifying a Jump List in Code 附加到对象在代码中通过调用静态方法。You attach a to an object in code by calling the static method. 这同样适用到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]shell。This also applies the to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell. 若要修改在运行时，调用方法来获取当前附加到。To modify a at run time, you call the method to get the that is currently attached to an . 已修改的属性后，必须调用方法以将更改应用于 Windows shell。After you have modified the properties of the , you must call the method to apply the changes to the Windows shell. > [!NOTE] > 您通常创建一个附加到并将应用于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]shell。You typically create one that is attached to the and applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell. 但是，你可以创建多个对象。However, you can create multiple objects. 只有一个一次可应用于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]shell 中，也只有一个适配器一次可以关联。Only one at a time can be applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell, and only one at a time can be associated with an . .NET Framework 不要求这些是相同。The .NET Framework does not require that these be the same . > [!NOTE] > 此类包含在类级别应用于所有成员的链接要求。This class contains a link demand at the class level that applies to all members. 一个直接调用方没有完全信任权限时引发。A is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)并[继承需求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For more information about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示具有跳转列表的应用程序。The following example shows an application with a Jump List. 该应用程序，可以将任务添加到当前的跳转列表，请清除的跳转列表中，内容，将新的跳转列表应用到应用程序的三个按钮。The application has three buttons that enable you to add a task to the current Jump List, clear the contents of the Jump List, and apply a new Jump List to the application. 下面的示例演示如何声明标记中。The following example shows how to declare a in markup. 包含两个链接，另一个。The contains two links and one . 将应用向 shell 将失败如果应用程序未注册为处理.txt 文件扩展名。Applying the to the shell will fail if the application is not registered to handle the .txt file name extension. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#000](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#000)] 下面的示例演示的代码隐藏页`App.xaml`。The following example shows the code-behind page for `App.xaml`. 此代码处理和事件。This code handles the and events. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml.cs#100)] 以下示例演示用于创建应用程序用户界面的标记。The following example shows the markup used to create the application user interface. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#300](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml#300)] 下面的示例演示的代码隐藏页`MainWindow.xaml`。The following example shows the code-behind page for `MainWindow.xaml`. 此代码演示了如何修改、 清除和创建在程序代码中。This code demonstrates how to modify, clear, and create a in procedural code. 有关新跳转列表，静态方法调用以将相关联与当前应用程序，并将应用到 Windows shell。For the new Jump List, the static method is called to associate the with the current application and apply the to the Windows shell. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#200](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#200)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks **最近**并**频繁**类别通常包含许多相同的跳转项。The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items. 因此，应用程序通常显示**最近**或**频繁**跳转列表中，但不同时的类别。As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both.

span.span: Adds the specified item path to the **Recent** category of the Jump List.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容**最近**类别管理的 Windows shell。The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell. 若要跳转列表中显示最近使用的项，请设置属性设置为`true`。To display recently used items in the Jump List, set the property to `true`. 您可以调用方法来请求 Windows shell 添加到项路径**最近**项列表。You can call the method to request that the Windows shell add an item path to the **Recent** items list. 如果你的应用程序未注册为处理的项的文件类型，则不会在中**最近**列表以及对调用将以静默方式失败。If your application is not registered to handle the file type of the item, it will not appear in the **Recent** list and calls to will fail silently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法发送的内容的 Windows shell 中其当前状态。The method sends the content of the to the Windows shell in its current state. 此调用完成后，属性修改为包含 Windows 外壳程序已成功添加到其任务栏跳转列表中的项目。After this call is complete, the property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its taskbar Jump List. 您可以通过事件处理程序访问的已删除的项列表和事件。You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the and events. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取当前清除的内容和集合。The following example shows how to get the current and clear the contents of the collection. 然后调用方法来应用更改为 Windows shell。The method is then called to apply the changes to the Windows shell. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以调用方法以获取当前与关联。You can call the method to get the currently associated with an . .NET Framework 不需要，这是的当前应用于 Windows shell。The .NET Framework does not require that this be the that is currently applied to the Windows shell. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取与当前应用程序相关联。The following example shows how to get the associated with the current application. 一个添加到集合并添加到**最近**类别。A is added to the collection and added to the **Recent** category. 调用方法来应用更新后到 Windows shell。The method is called to apply the updated to the Windows shell. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property JumpItems As List(Of JumpItem)

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取在跳转列表中显示的 对象的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of objects that are displayed in the Jump List.

value.span: 在跳转列表中显示的 对象的集合。

span.span: The collection of objects displayed in the Jump List.
The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跳转列表可以包含两种类型的项，和一个。Jump Lists can contain two types of items, a and a . 一个是一个链接到程序和一个是指向文件的链接。A is a link to a program and a is a link to a file. 当创建后，集合为空。When a is created, the collection is empty. 您可以添加任何或到集合的对象。You can add any or objects to the collection. 集合将仅包含已由你的程序添加的项。The collection will only contain items that have been added by your program. 之后通过成功调用传递给 Windows shell或方法，集合将包含已成功添加到任务栏跳转列表的项。After the has been passed to the Windows shell by a successful call to either the or methods, the collection will contain only the items that were successfully added to the taskbar Jump List. 未成功添加的项都将从中集合。Items that were not successfully added are removed from the collection. 您可以通过事件处理程序访问的已删除的项列表和事件。You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the and events. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取当前清除的内容和集合。The following example shows how to get the current and clear the contents of the collection. 然后调用方法来应用更改为 Windows shell。The method is then called to apply the changes to the Windows shell. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#230](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/mainwindow.xaml.cs#230)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event JumpItemsRejected As EventHandler(Of JumpItemsRejectedEventArgs)

summary.span: 在 Windows shell 将跳转项添加到跳转列表中失败时发生。

span.span: Occurs when jump items are not successfully added to the Jump List by the Windows shell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容之后应用于 Windows shell 中，属性修改为包含 Windows 外壳程序已成功添加到其跳转列表中的项目。After the contents of the are applied to the Windows shell, the property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its Jump List. 您可以通过事件处理程序访问的已删除的项列表和事件。You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the and events. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理事件，以在消息框中显示被拒绝的项。The following example shows how to handle the event to display the rejected items in a message box. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[Shell_JumpListSample#110](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml.cs#110)]

summary.span: 在用户从跳转列表中移除以前位于该列表中的跳转项时发生。

span.span: Occurs when jump items previously in the Jump List are removed from the list by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容之后应用于 Windows shell 中，属性修改为包含 Windows 外壳程序已成功添加到其跳转列表中的项目。After the contents of the are applied to the Windows shell, the property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its Jump List. 您可以通过事件处理程序访问的已删除的项列表和事件。You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the and events. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理事件，以在消息框中显示被拒绝的项。The following example shows how to handle the event to display the rejected items in a message box. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示常用项是否显示在跳转列表中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether frequently used items are displayed in the Jump List.

value.span: 如果常用项显示在跳转列表中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if frequently used items are displayed in the Jump List; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容**频繁**类别管理的 Windows shell。The contents of the **Frequent** category are managed by the Windows shell. 若要显示在跳转列表中经常使用的项目，请设置属性设置为`true`。To display frequently used items in the Jump List, set the property to `true`. **最近**并**频繁**类别通常包含许多相同的跳转项。The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items. 因此，应用程序通常显示**最近**或**频繁**跳转列表中，但不同时的类别。As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both. ## Examples 下面的示例演示配置为显示**频繁**类别。The following example shows a configured to show the **Frequent** category. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#001](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#001)]

span.span: if recently used items are displayed in the Jump List; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内容**最近**类别管理的 Windows shell。The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell. 若要显示在跳转列表中经常使用的项目，请设置属性设置为`true`。To display frequently used items in the Jump List, set the property to `true`. **最近**并**频繁**类别通常包含许多相同的跳转项。The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items. 因此，应用程序通常显示**最近**或**频繁**跳转列表中，但不同时的类别。As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both. 您可以调用方法来请求 Windows shell 添加的项**最近**项列表。You can call the method to request that the Windows shell add items to the **Recent** items list. 如果你的应用程序未注册为处理的项的文件名类型，则不会在中**最近**列表以及对调用将以静默方式失败。If your application is not registered to handle the file name type of the item, it will not appear in the **Recent** list and calls to will fail silently. ## Examples 下面的示例演示配置为显示**最近**类别。The following example shows a configured to show the **Recent** category. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-xaml[Shell_JumpListSample#001](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/shell_jumplistsample/cs/app.xaml#001)]
